name: Little Mimp
description:
You are experiencing the game from the perspective of the small forest imp "Mimp". Help him master his trial and accompany him on his journey to prove his worthiness to the tribe. But be cautious! Stay away from water, survive the jumps, collect the keys to unlock your passage and reach the great "Cristalum".

Controls:

Keyboard (recommend):

W/A/S/D - Move

Shift - Sprint

Space bar - Jump

Ctrl + Space bar - Teleport

E - Interact

Esc - Menu

Gamepad:

Left stick - Move

L2 / R2 - Sprint

Face button - Jump

L1 / R1 + Face button - Teleport

West button - Interact

Control button - Menu

- created by Julian Bindhammer
